title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 690/94 of 28 March 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for courgettes
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 690/94 of 28 March 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for courgettes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1994 marketing year, the reference prices for courgettes falling within CN code 0709 90 70, expressed in ecu per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- April (21 to 30): 71,79,
- May: 63,12,
- June: 42,18,
- July: 38,56,
- August: 44,91,
- September: 49,60.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 April 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
